about_the_game:
Welcome to Army Troop 2: Modern Guns, an old-school, PvP online multiplayer FPS shooter set in the heart of modern warfare. Immerse yourself in stunning, next-generation graphics and captivating gameplay that brings the intensity of combat to life like never before.

You can meticulously customize every aspect of your soldier's appearance, from their head features to their body armor and accessories. Explore a vast selection of camouflages, helmets, vests, and tactical gear to create a look that suits your style of combat. Enhance your soldier's capabilities with specialized attachments and gadgets for their weaponry, such as scopes, grips, and suppressors, tailored to your preferred playstyle. With such extensive customization options at your disposal, you can truly make your soldier stand out on the battlefield while ensuring they're equipped for victory.

Select weapons of various classes and styles including Assault rifles, SMGs, Sniper rifles, Shotguns, Pistols, Grenades, LMGs, Heavy Machine Guns, Grenade Launchers, Knives, and more, each with special combat properties. Customize your own unique class perks and weapon accessories such as Lasers, Sight Scopes, Silencers, Recoil Reducers, and more, and jump into the action.

Engage in intense team-based online PvP combat against players from around the globe on a selection of meticulously designed maps. Team up with friends or face off against them in adrenaline-fueled team deathmatch or free-for-all modes.

Experience intuitive controls and a user-friendly interface that make mastering the art of warfare effortless. Army Troop 2: Modern Guns is a dynamic shooter game, continuously evolving with regular updates that introduce new maps, weapons, equipment, perks, characters, and skins. Expect even more game modes in the pipeline as our developers tirelessly work on optimizing gameplay and matchmaking systems to ensure an unparalleled gaming experience for FPS enthusiasts.

Featuring an advanced Bot system, Army Troop 2: Modern Guns ensures that the action never stops. Even if there aren't enough real players online, our game seamlessly integrates advanced bots that mimic real player behavior, maintaining the excitement of 5 vs 5 matches. These bots possess human-like intelligence, with the ability to choose custom classes, employ tactics, and execute maneuvers just like real players, ensuring endless fun and competitive gameplay.

Army Troop 2: Modern Guns offers private match options where you can challenge your Steam friends or go head-to-head against AI opponents in solo play. With Army Troop 2: Modern Guns, the thrill of warfare is always at your fingertips, whether you're battling against friends or testing your skills against the most sophisticated AI adversaries.
